fullscreenplus.name: Fullscreen+
fullscreenplus.options.title: Display
fullscreenplus.config.customization.enab: Enable custom window position and size when in borderless mode.
fullscreenplus.config.customization.rela: Use coordinates relative to the monitor instead of absolute screen position.
fullscreenplus.config.dynamic_resolution: Render at a lower internal resolution for better performance while maintaining window size.
fullscreenplus.config.render_scale.toolt: Percentage of native resolution to render at. Lower = better performance.
Enable special handling for 21:9, 32:9 and other ultrawide aspect ratios.
fullscreenplus.config.hdr_passthrough.to: Allow HDR signals to pass through in borderless mode. Requires HDR-capable monitor and Windows 11.
fullscreenplus.config.refresh_rate_overr: Force a specific refresh rate instead of using monitor default.
fullscreenplus.config.windowed_borderles: Use borderless window at a custom size instead of fullscreen.
fullscreenplus.config.window_title.toolt: Set a custom window title. Leave empty for default.
fullscreenplus.config.low_latency.toolti: Reduce input lag by optimizing window composition. May increase CPU usage slightly.
fullscreenplus.config.show_notifications: Show toast notifications when fullscreen mode changes.
fullscreenplus.option.fullscreen_mode.to: Choose how fullscreen works. Borderless lets you alt-tab without screen flickering. Native uses traditional exclusive fullscreen. Exclusive Borderless combines both benefits.
